website_summaries.verdict: Eluktronics may be a lesser known brand, but they offer plenty of bells and whistles.
pros: Solid build, despite being made of plastic
Comes with a 128-gigabyte SSD, 8 gigabytes of RAM, and a full RGB backlit keyboard that can be turned off at your leisure
The 17.3-inch screen provides ample display room
cons: Speaker quality tends to be tinny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing build quality(literally!), amazing screen(just wow), not as heavy as my previous Alienware(it is actually pretty light compared to other gamng laptops), its much thinner than i expected, looks so smooth and blazing fast(around 2-3sec boot time) 2 cons tho,(which wont affect my 5 star rating but still) First battery life is super short compared to my other past gaming laptops, second keyboard is super weird. The placement of keys are little weird because they included the num pad on the right so you need a day or two to get used to it . (Fun fact: they sent the original windows installation disc and driver CD inside the box but the computer doesn't have a CD drive )
customer_reviews.author: Emir

customer_reviews.title: Worst Laptop I've ever used please buy a brand name
customer_reviews.text: I've owned this $1200 laptop for 8 months It's the worst built laptop In existence, $300 laptops blow the build quality of this laptop out the water. I was suckered in by the great specs. Specs aren't everything you can't enjoy this laptop because its uncomfortable to use. Stay away and buy a good brand Dell, Apple, Asus please don't make my same mistake I wish I can switch this laptop out for something better it's an embarrassment to use.
customer_reviews.author: Regis

customer_reviews.title: Fastest laptop I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: 1tb M2, 32gb ram, i7-8750 6core. I wanted to get the best fastest laptop I could that will last me 5yrs before upgrading. This will definitely do. Blazingly fast, can handle everything I throw at it. Looks beautiful too. Highly recommended. I'm not a gamer but plan on getting some games just because this rig can handle them. Also it's surprisingly light, much more so than I expected which is good as I travel a lot. Eventually plan on adding a 2nd HD for storage. You will be happy with this laptop. As far as I'm concerned it's the best you can get for under $2-2,500
customer_reviews.author: Meehow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Would definitely buy from Eluktronics again. If you do buy this, you may need to turn off Sound Blaster 3 or calibrate the settings of this feature. It had an echo when I got it, but it may be different for other users. Also, if you are going to be playing triple A titles, I recommend paying extra for the 16gb of ram. Eluktronics made this laptop very easy to upgrade, so you could add the ram yourself and save a little money.
customer_reviews.author: holly waters

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is great and is the best bang for your buck I could find. I feel that if this brand was one of the better known ones this would easily be sold as a $2500 laptop. I love its slick subtle design. It is a gaming computer but if you turn off the backlight keyboard you could not tell it is a gaming computer which means you could take it into the office without anyone noticing. I am very pleased with this set up, couldn't have gotten any better.
customer_reviews.author: Renton156

customer_reviews.title: perfect for on the go gaming/desktop replacement.
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews i decided to take a shot and was not dissapointed. No bloatware, fast boot-up and temps are exactly as expected with the cpu/gpu inside. I under-volted which dropped temps about 10-12 degrees which was a bonus. I have a laptop from a few years ago by Clevo and this is the same quality. Screen was uniform, high quality and the laptop itself was surprisingly light for its size. The trackpad is nice and smooth, the keys were nice and bright although the only downside id say is the left side gets warm but that's not anyone's fault. Overall was a really good purchase and highly recommend this laptop for on the go gaming or desktop replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K

customer_reviews.title: Decent Laptop but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I got this laptop to use when I went back to school. It was great for a long time. After a year the hinge broke. It broke about a day after the 1 year warranty ran out. This laptop pretty much lives on my desk so there was no damage to it, it wasn't dropped or mishandled in any way. The hing broke from just opening and closing the screen. Don't buy this if you plan on opening and closing the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Rugbystud137

customer_reviews.title: Solid laptop with good components for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is well-built. I added a 1TB hybrid drive after receiving it for storage (if you're a gamer, or routinely need a lot of storage, the SSD isn't large enough to use for very long by itself). I've been using it for a few months now, and am very pleased with the performance. It handles every game I've tried on it very well. The only limitations are the SSD, which performs at a SATA level, rather than the M.2 PCIe level you would expect (but still, it's an SSD, so it blows HDDs out of the water), and the speaker (but I've never heard a good laptop speaker).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a long career in IT and it's not often that a product offers as many pleasant surprises as this laptop from Eluktronics. The N850HK1 is a powerful laptop that easily handles the demanding polyconvolution synthesis application that prompted me to buy a new laptop. The build quality is very solid and while it's not a flashy case, it's got great components where it counts - from the display on down the list. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Curt W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good computer with excellent screen size and performance, but has build issues.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son, worked very well. However, seems to have mother board issues every 3 months. Sent it in the first time and they fixed it. They do have great customer service, were very helpfull with having my do what I could before sending it back. 3 months later same thing happened, computer refused to boot. This time I was able to take the back off and remove some cat hair and dust that seem to be short circuiting something. Computer is still working so far. Computer components get VERY hot so make sure you keep space around it so the fans can work.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Starr

customer_reviews.title: Performance is great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Performance is great for the price. Setting it up was easy and without problems. It took about an hour including installing a Windows update and it was up and running. This laptop is incredibly fast and actually quite user friendly for a Windows product. The only minor complaint is that opening and closing the lid feels a little bit cheap. It slams when closing and you have to hold the laptop down when opening the lid. The keyboard takes some time to get used to. Overall it's a really good value.
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Gaming Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Eluktronics gaming laptop a few years ago and still runs like new, only problem I had was with the hinges that broke for the wear and tear but I fixed them and good as new again, I absolutely love this laptop! I took so long to give a review but here it is, and prove that these laptops are great machines! I will buy another Eluktronics laptop when this one gets really old or whenever I feel like upgrading to a better one but for the moment this will do.
customer_reviews.author: David Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming laptop with GTX 1060 for under $1000
customer_reviews.text: First of all, Eluktronics as a seller has outstanding customer service. They reply to your emails within ours even on a weekend (including a Thanksgiving weekend). So kudos to them for that. In terms of this laptop, which is a Clevo-based machine, the quality is really good for the price. I think it is actually the cheapest machine with this specs you can get. Don't expect anything extraordinary, but if you want a solid and reliable laptop for under $1000, don't look any further. It is actually pretty light too.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: I've had no bad experiences with the laptop so far
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for a little over a week now and I have been enjoying it the entire time. The product was delivered on time and packaged very well. The laptop box was inside two other cardboard boxes. I also needed to sign for the package when it was delivered. The laptop itself has been running very well. The screen is very bright, the battery seems to last a long time (as long as you're not gaming), and the touchpad is very responsive. I've had no bad experiences with the laptop so far.
customer_reviews.author: James H

customer_reviews.title: and easy to set up and operate
customer_reviews.text: I finally bought this after my roommates convinced me to buy the version with more SSD space. It met every expectation and even exceeded some. Fast, reliable, and easy to set up and operate. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a laptop that has great performance and speed. The customizable light up keyboard was also one of the main reasons I went for this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Janet Breitenbach

customer_reviews.title: as well as not look like a gaming computer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because i needed a laptop that could handle moderate gaming requirements, as well as not look like a gaming computer. I have no problem playing any of my games on the highest graphics settings, and I'm very happy i can bring this into a lecture hall and not stick out. I'm very pleased with both the computer and the company behind it. The laptop feels well made, has exceeded all my performance requirements, and was very quickly shipped without a bunch of useless software pre-installed. Came from using a macbook pro, and very happy with my decision to switch.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Whittemore

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: An amazing laptop at a very reasonable price. No problems at all with my purchase. I recommend it to anyone looking for a powerful work computer that you can also play games on. The aesthetic does not shout "I'm a gamer!" which is helpful in some professional settings. Eluktronics may not be as well known as other PC building companies, but their dedication to quality and customer service made me satisfied and willing to buy from them again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Slayton

customer_reviews.title: and I am pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have stated their skepticism, I too was skeptical, but after seeing the positive reviews on the other Eluktronics products I figured it was worth a shot, and I am pleased with my purchase. Prior to buying I compared this machine to similar machines by Dell (horrible display), Acer (no included components for mounting/installing additional ssd), and Hp (more expensive, older GPU) and this was the best combination of hardware and price. I waited a week to post a review just to make sure there were no issues, and so far there have been none.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two years of service with no sign of stopping
customer_reviews.text: I am a techie -- I spend an average of 8 hours a day in front of my computer, sometimes much more. I am constantly hooking up peripherals, tinkering with different dongles, constantly crying out for extra ports, etc. My computer is my workstation, my entertainment center, and my access point to the entirety of the world. This laptop is one of the best pre-builds I've ever owned, and it is my go-to when I'm on the move. From business trips to personal travel, this machine will NOT let you down.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben Candelaria

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Im using this laptop to learn how to make games, so far it runs really well. i also use it to game here and there when i can. for the price its great. my friend got this exact laptop too, and he loves it has no complaints. all in all great purchase, runs well and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Alenfishman

customer_reviews.title: trying to get in contact with anyone... tired of this crap being broken. i want my money back.
customer_reviews.text: i have been trying to get ahold of someone for the past month with no answer emails. don't buy this pease of crap it keeps breaking and I'm tired of being ignored. i want my money back you can have this overpriced paperweight back.
customer_reviews.author: theknee

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with its speed while gaming and the small SSD ...
customer_reviews.text: [My comments refer to the 128GB SSD + @ 2TB HDD] I've had my laptop for a little over a week and am really enjoying it so far. I am very happy with its speed while gaming and the small SSD with a 2TB HD seems to be a great combination of hard drive speed and storage.. The 15.6" screen seems very big and is a beautiful display. The only thing I'm not loving is the keyboard and trackpad - they are nice enough but not top of the line like the rest of the laptop (so I purchased a cheap optical mouse and usb keyboard for my at home use - problem solved).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: There are only two problems and both are easily solved. The speakers don't sound super great
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for about three months now. There are only two problems and both are easily solved. The speakers don't sound super great, but this is fixed by using headphones. The fans are a little louder than expected, but again, this is fixed by using headphones. Great machine.
customer_reviews.author: david brown

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a pretty strong laptop and a relatively good price point
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiancee. Seems to be a pretty strong laptop and a relatively good price point, though other laptops have come around with similar specs from more well-known brands. It has occasionally blue screened from driver issues, but I dont think thats an Eluktronics issue, just a windows issue. A lot of other laptops have issues randomly too, its just a matter of finding the driver causing the issue and updating the drivers usually. It does blow pretty hot air out of the right side though when gaming, but not at a damaging temp to the components I dont think
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop almost a week now and so far its great. I love the light up keyboard. Laptop is very fast. Setup was quick and easy. Im not a gamer but I wanted something powerful and am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: this is a great company with commitment to quality products. I was surprised to run across an awesome company that I didn't know about with great laptops/hardware. Totally glad I took the risk based on the reviews. Drivers needed to be updated on arrival but that takes like 5 seconds. I'm writing this review on the laptop!!! haha it's fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa D.

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Lightweight. 4lbs lighter than my old laptop. Boot time is about 4 seconds with the m2 ssd. They provide the tray to install a second ssd which is nice. Although opening up the laptop to put in another drive at first is a little unnerving. After playing games for awhile the laptop still isn't super hot. Con: Sound just seems a little off.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop! Handles Starcraft II like a champ. Meeting and/or exceeding all of my expectations. I like the fact that it is a gaming laptop but doesn't appear as one so I will not get funny looks at work. The only complaint I have is a small nitpick which is not worth giving it less than 5 stars. I do not like the placement of the zero key on the numpad. I am used to it being where the right arrow key is, but keyboard layout is a compromise for any laptop.
customer_reviews.author: arturo ramirez

customer_reviews.title: A great machine for an experienced PC user!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that this machine came with no bloatware on it at all. The flip side is that I had to install some of my own hardware drivers, bit that's not an issue if you are familiar with the process. The support from Eluktronics has been amazing and I have enjoyed my laptop so far! UPDATE I originally bought my laptop back in November, Unfortunately today (2/11/19) I suffered a power failure. Normally this would mean I would down rate the product, but after talking with Eluktronics Support, they are taking the laptop back for repairs. I will update this review when I know more!
customer_reviews.author: William Archer

customer_reviews.title: This laptop is very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is very good for the price. The keyboard idnt bad and the RGB keyboard features are very extensive. I will be getting an SSD and that will make this laptop perfect. The trackpad isnt the best and takes some getting used to but to its credit I normally dont use trackpads so i may be abit harsh. The sound is also good. Overall I would recommend this laptop and if you're worried by the brand dont be I was also and it turned out to be an irrational worry.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan U.

customer_reviews.title: Beastly laptop for reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Handles Dark Souls 3, Witcher 3 and Civilization 6 like a dream on high settings. Will definitely recommend Eluktronics in the future to all family and friends. Only took 2 hours to get fully updated from out of the box and I was impressed with the power this beast pumps out. Windows 10 comes installed and you only have to update it and get rid of the added software Microsoft puts on. Now I can game at work with the power of a desktop computer at my fingertips!
customer_reviews.author: campman

customer_reviews.title: One of best laptops I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice powerful laptop. Gaming on it has been great. After comparing other laptops with the same or similar specs this one came out on top. I plan add a M.2 drive and use the installed HDD for additional storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best gaming laptop for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned as I didnt know this brand but after searching found out they are based here on the east coast and the vast majorory of reviews were excellent. So I took the plunge and couldnt be happier. Well made laptop, aluminium case, vivid screen and nice feel keyboard. I play xcom2, Fallout 4, Conan Exiles and other games on it with FX on max and plays them smoothly with no issue. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Peter White

customer_reviews.title: Terrific machine. My only concern was the "read before ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrific machine. My only concern was the "read before opening". The warranty seems to be very detailed and somewhat picky. But the performance is excellent and it appears to be very well constructed. Has some weight to it, but well worth what you get with the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe F.

customer_reviews.title: This thing screams through my workloads!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop for the money. I have been looking for a laptop to use to run Virtual Instruments, mainly Native Instrument VI's as well as to do some light video editing and website design. This laptop so far screams through everything I have thrown at it. It has great specs and handles all the work loads I have thrown at it. In hind sight I may have spend a couple hundred dollars more and gotten a larger SSD or a second SSD and may go back and order another one to add some more local storage, but other than that this thing just rocks. Eluktronics, you have a good product here, keep up the good work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great screen, computer responds very well over all
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had all the time Ive needed/wanted to set up this computer properly but I can tell you so far its impressed me a lot. Starts up fast, keyboard feels smooth, great screen, computer responds very well over all. I cant give it 5 stars because I havent used it all too much since Ive got it (due to surgery) I even called their customer support for a quick/easy answer and it was absolutely painless JUST LIKE IT SHOULD BE. And that is greatly appreciated. I will update this when I have used it more
customer_reviews.author: Rey

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop so far
customer_reviews.text: Had this laptop for about a week and so far it has handled everything I've thrown at it. Played Hitman on ultra setting for a few hours and cpu and gpu Temps stayed withing reasonable levels which was a concern I had based on other reviews. Customer service is great. If you want to upgrade the base model you can buy straight from eluktronics to maintain your warranty. Also love that windows comes installed clean except for the software to control the custom hardware. Overall a great gaming laptop that isn't as gaudy as a typical gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: Random crashes
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to write this review to get a good feel for the computer... it frequently crashes out of the blue and it's been like that since day one..I have updated the drivers and done all I can it just won't stop with the crashing.. sad because its a really nice laptop while it's working..
customer_reviews.author: kitty

customer_reviews.title: Premium build at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My config: 15" | 1050Ti | 256GB SSD + 8GB RAM; received 1/10/2018 Pros: Sturdy material, super quick boot time (a few seconds at most); powerful CPU; crisp screen; comfortable keyboard; design doesn't scream "gamer" to everyone at the coffee shop or office; customizeable function keys; minimal bloatware; decent battery life for the specs (~5-6 hours in my initial experience) Cons (super minor): Trackpad has a somewhat coarse surface that took a bit of getting used to
customer_reviews.author: alex

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the quality and cost ratio, one of the best specifications for great price. I will recommend this over some of the name brands.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. I was a bit skeptical at first ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. I was a bit skeptical at first because 'Eluktronics' was not a brand I've come across before but I'm glad I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Kiafis

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this laptop
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this laptop. Build quality is great. Boots quickly and everything seems to run fast. No problem with the games so far and works great for image processing programs. Battery life is not as long as some other laptops. At this price I don't think you would be able to find another laptop with these specs with a better battery.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Hickey

customer_reviews.title: amazing computer. has a great build
customer_reviews.text: amazing computer. has a great build, fast as hell, surprisingly quiet, typing feels great, 15" is more than enough space for my use (quite big actually), and not as heavy as it should be given its performance. very satisfied with the purchase - will seriously consider Eluktronics for all my future computers
customer_reviews.author: Jae R.

customer_reviews.title: Fast, cost effective
customer_reviews.text: I used it for 2 weeks, and everything works well. Its totally enough for DOTA2, and it doesn't very strange it I take it to classrooms. Haven't found any problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitian Li

customer_reviews.title: Shoudl've got 512GB, so I'll probably update it soon, just not sure if I can get the same drive (NVme) as an addition.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a heavy programmer, gamer and user. Didn't expect to have such a great machine for this price, honestly. I hope the company continues with such great products AND services as I'm not inclined to pursue other brands. Ref. Eluktronics N870HP6 Pro-X Gaming Laptop 1060 256 PCIe SSD + 16GB RAM 17.3"
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldo Costa

customer_reviews.title: This computer's all aces.
customer_reviews.text: I bought his computer to run X-Plane 10, and it does so superbly. The battery doesn't last long, but X-Planes of all versions require a lot of power. The touch pad's a little hinky, i.e., sometimes a function is performed that I don't want, but that could be b/c of Windows 10. Hard to tell. Screen graphics are fantastic. Overall I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This thing screams through everything I throw at it. Solid build with expansion potential and no bloat. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Trustworthy person

customer_reviews.title: ... computer for about a week now and it is amazing! I used this computer to replace my old ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this computer for about a week now and it is amazing! I used this computer to replace my old MSI GE60 2PL. This the perfect computer especially for its price. With the i7 (2.8GHz) quad core processor and NVIDIA graphics I have been able to run any game so far in high quality with no issues. I would highly recommend this computer!
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: very good so far
customer_reviews.text: very good so far. Fast. works well when I multitask between LightRoom Photoshop and surfing webs. Sound system is not that great. It's too low
customer_reviews.author: Scout Atticus

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with outstanding performance
customer_reviews.text: I have had this laptop for about a week so far with no problems. Looks great with outstanding performance. I was looking for a gaming laptop for a while, and I almost went with the predator until I researched more into this one. Glad I chose this one. Only thing you might want to consider is getting another hard drive to install.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan E

customer_reviews.title: Awesome computer
customer_reviews.text: Great computer, but tech support are not advanced, if you have to reinstall your windows make sure, you're update to the latest windows version, or your Nvidia driver won't work. And get driver easy software.... Trust me. Other than that everything I throw at this computer flawless same speed... Worth the money, you'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lovins

customer_reviews.title: This laptop was a great investment for its price
customer_reviews.text: This laptop was a great investment for its price. After using this for 8 months, I still have no problems with it. It's fast, quiet, and has no problems running several intense programs at the same time. The only cons I can find for this laptop is its weight, but I expected that out of a gaming laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this laptop primarily for gaming as well as just general computer usage and have yet to be disappointed at all. It has been quick and responsive and easy to use/set up. I also bought an extra HDD for storage and it was an easy install. Great laptop so far, glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tindall

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop by a great company
customer_reviews.text: Best value for price range of 1100ish dollars. Comes with great build quality, rgb keys, gtx1060, ips display, no bloatware, and great customer service. I returned a dell Inspiron that had disappointing build quality and got the N850 instead. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Kohei Otsuka

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Day 1: so far so good. Setup was good, laptop looks nice, keyboard feels good. The fan did start blasting from the beginning and I got a bit nervous. But after 5 minutes it settled and has been good so far. I do have to say that I have the laptop on a cooler. I’ll report back in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Jean-paul S.

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: This laptop has been great and definitely worth the price, can run almost any game with ease and does everything I need it to. Only problem is it can be a bit noisy when doing multiple tasks.
customer_reviews.author: jake paps

customer_reviews.title: A great laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop arrived in great shape from being bouble boxed. This laptop was just what I wanted. It is fast and free of bloat ware. Turned it on per instructions and it open to Windows 10 with no problems. I would buy this laptop again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast great hardware
customer_reviews.text: Laptop ordered comes with Samsung m.2 PCIE hard drive, no bloat Ware (OS & drivers only). Great display, quality components all around. Kind and fast service shipped to door same week
customer_reviews.author: Elliot May

customer_reviews.title: Great PC for Price, Comes with even better customer support
customer_reviews.text: Very nice PC for the price. Had an issue where the BIOS software caused intermittent freezing out of the box. Support was very good about getting the issue resolved quickly. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gamwise

customer_reviews.title: Great, clean & fast computer!
customer_reviews.text: Great computer! Arrived in a well-packed box, boots on quickly and without any real bloatware. Runs games like starcraft 2 without breaking a sweat and multitasking is very easy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: na
customer_reviews.text: i rate a 3 before it should have been a 5 great laptop
customer_reviews.author: don bates

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gaming laptop!! runs very smooth and fast loading at startup design looks great love the keyboard as well
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: This is the best laptop I have had and I love that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not a heavy game player but I create training materials and teach online so I wanted s quad core laptop. This is the best laptop I have had and I love that it can be easily upgraded. I got a basic model and upgraded to 32 go, a 525 m.2 ssd, and added a 2tb had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: best bang for the buck, a laptop under $1000 with the GTX1060...amazing super fast, no bs bloatware.... ordered it tuesday and got it thursday. i love it
customer_reviews.author: great anator

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing this laptop is probably the best decision that I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Rocwkell

customer_reviews.title: It gets pretty hot when gaming for 30min so if you're using ...
customer_reviews.text: It gets pretty hot when gaming for 30min so if you're using the laptop keyboard it might bother you. The display has some screen bleeding but other than that I love it :)
customer_reviews.author: Lisandro Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Acer Predator
customer_reviews.text: The specs on this laptop are comparable to those of an Acer gaming laptop (e.g. Acer Predator). It's a wonderful laptop and the keyboard backlight is great. The price is affordable as well. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: solid gaming laptop WHILE PLUGGED IN TO POWER.
customer_reviews.text: It is quite nice runs heroes of the storm all settings maxed over 100 frames.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, no problems 4 months in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing computer with great specs! Works great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Adams

customer_reviews.title: The laptop is awesome! I love the customization with it and how ...
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is awesome! I love the customization with it and how you can easily add storage devices and make everything your own personal way.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop! No Nonsense Laptop!
customer_reviews.text: I love the speed, performance and beautiful display. I wish it was more portable.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is really good product. Easy to setup. I downloaded few games and had no problem so far.

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had my laptop for a couple months now and I'm very pleased. Only cons are It can get kind of loud and the plastic that lays between the keys isn't flush on my unit.
customer_reviews.author: Ed R

customer_reviews.title: Good performance laptop
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop i have ever used. performance is great and looks great. graphic is real nice and price is good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy as gift for someone too!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop thus far as others have added I love how discrete it is in a office setting!
customer_reviews.author: Nate3stacks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great computer for school. delivery was extra fast.vset up was easy.
customer_reviews.author: L. Zteam

customer_reviews.title: Having Issues with Performance and Disk Usage
customer_reviews.text: Have had the laptop 8 months. Worked great for two months and then disk usage went through the roof and began getting FPS lag in games. Minimal files present on computer, almost exclusively a stationary gaming laptop for some relatively low impact games (Rocket League). Have reached out to support (albeit very recently) and am waiting on a response. Hopefully they can resolve the issues so I won't just end up buying a new laptop all over again.
customer_reviews.author: Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Beast of a computer made for any game on the market today!
customer_reviews.author: UlrikeMorrow

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded from a Dell Latitude E6520 running an intel I7-2640M ...
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from a Dell Latitude E6520 running an intel I7-2640M @ 2.8. I'm not a gamer, but a number cruncher, and the Elucktronics is FAR faster.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ori

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great budget gaming laptop! Super graphics and runs extremely well
customer_reviews.author: Al W Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Awesome laptop! Great for gaming and stays cool even after using for a number of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Preston D. Gause

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just got it in and working great right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Finley

customer_reviews.title: Love it to death
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband got 2 of these for ourselves this spring. This was his first laptop and my first 'good' laptop. Never used windows 10 before either. Love it to death. The laptop runs smooth and great. I can play all my games 100%. Would buy again! Thank you guys!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Harmon

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PC WITH AMAZINGS SPECS AND PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Great pc with excellent quality and price! With this I can play Titanfall 2 on the highest graphics setting! The support is great with friendly AMERICANS!!
customer_reviews.author: DeceptivTruth96

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Laptop
customer_reviews.text: Laptop came as advertised. Never heard of this company as they are new to the market. This laptop works great. Purchased for my daughter as the laptop she had been using was outdated and buttons started to fall off. Able to play Overwatch with no issues. Many inputs built-in as the laptop has an external monitor, keyboard, mouse, and headphones. Very easy to setup. I would recommend this laptop. Also no "trial software installed" which, in my opinion, is a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop. Runs cool and the build is very ...
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Runs cool and the build is very solid. The IPS screen is amazing..... However, initially there was a problem. The WLAN driver was causing the system to reboot....frequently. A couple of drivers were updated before I realized that the WLAN driver was the problem. After it was updated this system became a tank and now handles anything thrown at it. It's a fantastic piece of equipment. And, as a night owl, the backlit keys are so sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R.

customer_reviews.title: the screen is perfect and probably the best screen I've ever had on ...
customer_reviews.text: After spending quite some time with the laptop I have to say it's well made and high quality, the screen is perfect and probably the best screen I've ever had on a laptop. I highly recommend this product. Also my final note would be to add a primary component list so I know what's inside if I need to replace or add anything. I'd love to know without opening what 8gb ram stick I have in order to get another to bring it up to 16gb.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: CSGO on high settings runs smooth like butter. PUBG on medium settings is also very ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only had it for about a week, but I can give you some feedback regarding its performance for the type of games that I play. CSGO on high settings runs smooth like butter. PUBG on medium settings is also very smooth. Battlefield 4 and Battlefront 2 on medium settings are also great! SO far very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Had trouble with overheating and had to return.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this laptop as a gift for my brother. When it was working it was quite impressive. Very powerful. Unfortunately it had issues with overheating while playing games (PUBG and Battlefield 1) to the point that it would freeze or force shutdown. I returned it and bought a different laptop as a replacement gift.
customer_reviews.author: A. Part.

customer_reviews.title: The laptop is well built and has good ergonomics, however there are two issues
customer_reviews.text: The laptop is well built and has good ergonomics, however there are two issues. The first is I regularly run into BSOD with preinstalled drivers (windows 10,also pre-installed). The second is that there is no way to control keyboard backlight on Linux. I would change my rating if either of the problems would be solved. All in all is a good device and I can recommend it despite the problems described above.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Average laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Had some issues with the drive making noise and the desktop operations seemed slow. This was a gift for my brother so spending nearly $1300 I was hoping for a better experience.
customer_reviews.author: Alie Spooky

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great system, but a pain to get the nvidia card working on linux.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad sectors on hard drive
customer_reviews.text: System is good but has bad sectors on hard drive
customer_reviews.author: Baby

product_meta.title: Eluktronics N870HK1 Pro-X Gaming Laptop - Intel Core i7-7700HQ Quad Core Windows 10 Home 4GB GDDR5 NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 17.3” Full HD IPS Display 128GB PCIe NVMe SSD + 8GB DDR4 RAM
product_meta.description:
The Eluktro Pro N870HK1 is a high performance gaming PC by Eluktronics which includes premium components & hardware. This powerful arsenal is ready for you to take on any challenge, including the most demanding AAA titles with Nvidia's latest Pascal graphics. A next gen PCIe SSD paired with Intel's 7th gen Core i7 CPU will breeze through workloads. An IPS full HD panel offers a pristine picture with vibrant colors. Eluktronics prides themselves on offering a quality PC with fast & clear USA based customer support. Performance PC's are a dime a dozen, but greatness is still up for grabs!

Operating System: Genuine Windows 10 Home 64-Bit (Clean Installation, No Bloatware)

Processor: Intel Core i7-7700HQ Quad Core (2.8-3.8GHz TurboBoost, 6MB L3 Cache)

RAM: 8GB DDR4 2400MHz RAM (1 Dimm)

Display: 17.3" LG Full HD IPS 60Hz Refresh Rate Anti-Glare Display (1920 x 1080)

Graphics: 4GB GDDR5 VRAM NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti

Primary Drive: 128GB Eluktro Pro-X Ultra Performance PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD

RAM Expandability: One empty RAM slot, One 2.5” 7mm HDD/SSD, SATA III interface (Caddy & Mounting hardware included!)

Optical Drive: N/A

Wireless: Intel Dual-Band Wireless-AC 8265 2x2 + Bluetooth 4.2

Keyboard: Premium Full-size RGB Backlit Keyboard with 10-key numeric keypad

Webcam: 2.0MP Full HD Webcam & Array Mic

Ports: 2 USB 3.0 Ports, 1 USB 2.0, 1 USB 3.1 Gen 2 port (Type C), HDMI (with HDCP), 2 Mini DisplayPorts, Gigabit Ethernet, 1 Headphone jack, 1 Microphone jack, SD Card Reader

Added Security: Fingerprint Reader; TPM 2.0; Kensington Lock

Audio: Sound Blaster Cinema 3

Power: 120 Watt AC Adapter

Battery: 6-Cell 62WHr

Weight: 6.8lbs

Dimensions:16.47 x 11.36 x 1.08" 

Warranty: One Year Eluktronics
feature_bullets: 7th Gen Intel Core i7-7700HQ (2.8GHz/3.8GHz) Quad Core Processor, Genuine Windows 10 Home 64-Bit
4GB GDDR5 VRAM Nvidia GeForce GTX 1050 Ti Graphics; 8GB DDR4 2400MHz RAM (1 Dimm)
17.3" Full HD IPS 60Hz LED Anti-Glare Display (1920 x 1080); 1 HDMI; 2 Mini DisplayPorts; 1 USB 3.1 Type-C
128GB Ultra Performance PCIe NVMe M.2 SSD; Full HD 2.0MP Webcam; Intel Wireless-AC 8265 + Bluetooth v4.2
Full Size RGB Color Backlit Keyboard, Sound Blaster Cinema 3 Audio, Gigabit LAN, 1 Year Warranty
